concise_definition: n. 帖子, 柱子, 职位; v. 发布, 张贴, 任命

definitions.explanation_en: A message or piece of content published on a social media platform, website, or online forum, intended for public or group viewing.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在社交媒体平台、网站或在线论坛上发布的信息或内容，供公众或群体查看。
definitions.example_en: She shared a photo of her vacation on Instagram and received hundreds of likes on the post.
definitions.example_cn: 她在 Instagram 上分享了一张度假照片，这条帖子收到了数百个赞。

definitions.explanation_en: A vertical support or pillar, typically made of wood, metal, or concrete, used to hold up structures or mark boundaries.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指用于支撑结构或标记边界的垂直支柱，通常由木材、金属或混凝土制成。
definitions.example_en: The fence was secured to wooden posts driven deep into the ground.
definitions.example_cn: 围栏被固定在深深打入地下的木柱上。

definitions.explanation_en: A position or job, especially one with specific duties or responsibilities, often within an organization or government.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指一个职位或工作，尤其指在组织或政府中具有特定职责的岗位。
definitions.example_en: He applied for a post as a senior editor at the newspaper.
definitions.example_cn: 他申请了报社高级编辑的职位。

definitions.explanation_en: To publish or upload content, especially digital content, to a website, social media platform, or online system.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将内容（尤其是数字内容）发布或上传到网站、社交媒体平台或在线系统中。
definitions.example_en: He posts daily updates about his hiking adventures on his blog.
definitions.example_cn: 他每天在他的博客上发布关于徒步旅行的更新。

definitions.explanation_en: To display or affix a notice, announcement, or advertisement in a public place.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在公共场所张贴通知、公告或广告。
definitions.example_en: The university posted the exam schedule on the bulletin board.
definitions.example_cn: 大学在公告栏上张贴了考试时间表。

definitions.explanation_en: To assign someone to a particular position or location, especially in a military or official context.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将某人指派到特定职位或地点，尤其用于军事或官方语境。
definitions.example_en: She was posted to the embassy in Tokyo for two years.
definitions.example_cn: 她被派往东京大使馆任职两年。

comparison.analysis: “Article”（文章）通常指结构完整、篇幅较长、内容较正式的书面作品，常见于新闻、学术或杂志中；而 “post” 更偏向于非正式、即时性、常用于社交媒体的短内容，形式更自由。
“Column”（专栏）是定期发表的、有固定作者和主题的系列文章，通常具有个人风格和深度分析；而 “post” 是单次发布的独立内容，不一定有规律性或深度，更注重时效性和互动性。
“Notice”（通知）是用于传达正式信息的简短公告，通常具有权威性或法律效力，如学校通知、政府公告；而 “post” 可以是任何类型的内容，包括个人分享、广告或娱乐信息，语境更广泛且非正式。
